name: Dora's Adventures On LSD
description:
This is a School Project

Warning: This Game Can Cause Nausea!

This Game Is Made For A Four Hour Mini Gamejam.

Welcome to Dora's Adventures! Meet the beautiful world of chaos and trip your way to the end! Bring all the bombs to the detonator and end it with a blast!

Created by The Land Of Chaos (Team 5).
